node.name: IotikEnginesBackward
node.description: Enables motors on the given ports in reverse mode with the given power. Ports are specified in accordance with IoTik controller notations (for example MA, MB) and divided by commas. The power is specified in percents with the number from -100 to 100, if negative number is specified then the motor is enabled in the usual mode.

node.name: IotikEnginesForward
node.description: Enables motors on the given ports with the given power. Ports are specified in accordance with IoTik controller notations (for example MA, MB) and divided by commas. The power is specified in percents with the number from -100 to 100, if negative number is specified then the motor is enabled in the reverse mode.

node.name: IotikAngularServo
node.description: Manages angular servomotor. Sets up rotation angle on the given port in degrees. Values from 0 to 90 are correspond to a clockwise rotation and values from -90 to 0 correspond to counterclockwise rotation.

node.name: IotikEnginesStop
node.description: Disables motors on the given ports.

node.name: IotikClearDisplay
node.description: Clears everything drawn on the robot`s screen.

node.name: IotikPrintString
node.description: Prints a given line in the specified coordinates on the robot`s screen.

node.name: IotikDrawPixel
node.description: Draws one pixel in the specified coordinates on the robot screen.

node.name: IotikDrawLine
node.description: Draws a segment on the robot screen. The parameters specify the ends of the segment.

node.name: IotikDrawRect
node.description: Draws a rectangle on the robot screen. The parameters specify the coordinates of top-left corner, the width and the height of the rectangle.

node.name: IotikDrawEllipse
node.description: Draws the ellipse defined by the rectangle beginning at (x, y) with the given width and height.
